sentences.en: A paralyzing peace has plunged the members of the Gun Club in deplorable inactivity.
sentences.cn: 无聊的和平使大炮俱乐部的会员们陷入可悲的无所事事的生活中.

sentences.en: A state of sluggishness , inactivity, and apathy.
sentences.cn: 无精打采,呆滞:懒散,无生气, 冷漠的状态.

sentences.en: And several cancers are related to inactivity.
sentences.cn: 而且一些癌症与不运动是有关的.

sentences.en: Automatically switching to Block most policy after certain period of inactivity or screen saver activation.
sentences.cn: 在萤幕保护程式运作或系统时自动转换到全拦截模式.

sentences.en: Don’t suddenly take up violent exercise after years of inactivity.
sentences.cn: 多年没锻炼不要突然进行剧烈运动。

sentences.en: Inactivity idles the brain and stagnates your potential to reach your goals.
sentences.cn: 什么都不做会让大脑无聊同时阻碍你实现目标的潜力.

sentences.en: Its compact appearance is a reflection of its inactivity.
sentences.cn: 它的致密的形态是其失活的反映.

sentences.en: Silence or inactivity does not in itself amount to acceptance.
sentences.cn: 缄默或不行动本身不等于接受.

sentences.en: The moment you let avoiding failure become your motivator, you're down the path of inactivity.
sentences.cn: 当你把避免失败作为事情的动机时, 就等于走上了无所作为的道路.

sentences.en: The number of seconds of inactivity spin down the disks when on AC power.
sentences.cn: 使用交流电源时计算机闲置此秒数后开启硬盘降速.

sentences.en: The three men stunned into silence and inactivity.
sentences.cn: 这三个男人在一边呆若木鸡、不知所措.

sentences.en: The time spent between jobs should not be a period of inactivity.
sentences.cn: 工作之余不应无所事事。

sentences.en: There are three states of such inactivity.
sentences.cn: 这种不活跃有三种情况.

sentences.en: These include ahigh blood pressure, high cholesterol, tobacco use, diabetes, obesity, physical inactivity or poor nutrition.
sentences.cn: 这些包括高血压, 高胆固醇, 吸烟, 糖尿病, 肥胖, 缺乏运动或缺乏营养.

sentences.en: These include high blood pressure, high cholesterol, tobacco use, diabetes, obesity, physical inactivity or poor nutrition.
sentences.cn: 包括高血压, 高胆固醇, 吸烟, 糖尿病, 肥胖, 缺乏运动和营养不良.

sentences.en: You know that strong moves spring from periods of relative inactivity.
sentences.cn: 你避免像新手那样犯错,只关心有波动和兴趣的市场.

sentences.en: Your session with the server may have expired because of inactivity.
sentences.cn: 您在服务器上的本次登录因闲置不用而到期.

words.tran_cn: 不活跃的；不活动的；怠惰的；闲置的
[生物] 失活；[化学] 钝化（作用）
使不活动；使不活泼；阻止活动
静止；不活泼；休止状态；不放射性

trans.tran_cn: 不活动，不活跃，静止，不活泼
trans.tran_en: the state of not doing anything, not moving, or not working
